Title: Light Camera Action
Description:
Oh, hi! Isn't this a great shot? I love my S.E.L.F.I.E. camera!

Do you want me to make you one, too? I only need a few parts!

For the strap, I'll need a Russet Belt from one of the armor merchants in Stormwind.

I've already ordered more housings, you're welcome to take one, you just have to find where my shipment ended up!

Oh, and a Standard Scope, most any engineer can make you one of those.

Ok, are you ready for a little photography action?!
ObjectivesText: Collect an Iron Box and a Russet Belt from locations within the capital, and a Standard Scope from an engineer.
